website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a Schwinn that's fairly basic but affordable, this is the one to choose. It's easy to maneuver and offers an easy, comfortable ride on most surface conditions.
pros: A well-made bike with swept-back handlebars, a sturdy build, and a newly designed frame, all for a surprisingly low price
Earns praise for being easy to assemble
cons: Rare reports of gear issues requiring a trip to the repair shop
Not the fastest bike on our list at only seven speeds

customer_reviews.title: Looks like an orange dreamsicle.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this bike! It is more orange than yellow. I am 5’5 and have short legs. It fits me perfectly. I bought it mostly for the look. I will need to adjust to only having 5 speeds but I haven’t rode a bike in a long time so that should be easy. I bought mine Like New from the amazon warehouse for half price.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. C

customer_reviews.title: everything as advertised
customer_reviews.text: great price, went up 40.00 day after i bought it. seems to be good quality , seat not so much, memory foam. but not much suspension, and memory foam wont hold up under extended use. so i changed it out, havnt ridden yet, waiting on spring. good fit for shorter legs, 29 in inseem. didnt care for white seat or grips.easy assy. well packed and protected.
customer_reviews.author: hodie1

customer_reviews.title: In love with it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! There is a small issue with the breaks- just a little bit noisy when I break hard but I am used to it. Very comfortable and absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Sonrisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike!
customer_reviews.text: This bike was great! There is a little assembly but overall it is pretty easy. However, shipping took longer than expected. It took 1 and a half weeks longer than expected. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Thu Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: A bit difficult to assemble, the seat was a bit uncomfy, but rides very well. Love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Kaley Klapisch

customer_reviews.title: Two Right Peddles No Left Peddle
customer_reviews.text: We did not receive the correct parts for the bike. Two right peddles. Missing left peddle.
customer_reviews.author: J Kay Van

customer_reviews.title: Fits my wife perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bike and my wife loves it!! My wife is 5'1" tall and it fits her perfectly. Only negative comment is that it took a very long time to get here.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Dickendasher

customer_reviews.title: wonderful bike
customer_reviews.text: it is a joy to ride..very comfortable and easy handling.A superior model
customer_reviews.author: Jan Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Best bike ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best Gift EVER. It’s the prettiest bike I’ve ever seen. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for our almost 5 foot tall 9 year old. She usually rides my bike, by preference, so I was happy to find a new bike that would fit her and not involve her brothers getting mad at me. It is a beautiful orange, just classic in style and color. She is really pleased with it. She has more speeds than I do. I have stronger legs so it all works out in the end. :D
customer_reviews.author: Trouble

product_meta.title: Schwinn Suburban Comfort Hybrid Bike, Featuring Low Step-Through Steel Frame and 7-Speed Drivetrain with 26-Inch Wheels, Small/16-Inch Frame, Orange, 16-Inch/Small Frame (S5483C)
product_meta.description: Great for your local bike path or cruising around town, the 26" Schwinn Suburban is the perfect comfort bike for casual riders. Your hands will enjoy the comfort of the ergonomic handlebar grips, while your rear end is certain to appreciate the Schwinn Quality comfort seat. More versatile than your typical cruiser, 7-speed shifters with a reliable Shimano drivetrain will have you zooming through your local paved trails. Light alloy rims and comfortable swept-back handlebars put the finishing touches on this sleek comfort bike that's sure to be a hit around the neighborhood. Like all Schwinn bikes, the Suburban comes with a limited lifetime for as long as you own the bike. Enjoy the freedom of riding a Schwinn.
feature_bullets: Schwinn steel comfort step-thru frame and suspension fork offer a responsive ride and comfortable riding position
7-Speed Micro shift twist shifter with Schwinn shift icons and Shimano rear derailleur combine for quick and easy gear changes
Front and rear alloy linear pull brakes provide crisp all-condition stopping, while light and strong alloy rims add crucial durability
Swept back comfort handlebar keeps you upright for a riding position that's more comfortable and easier on your back
Schwinn quality comfort seat and ergonomic grips help soften the ride at key touch points
